# largeSubtitleTextAttributes

**Instance Property**

The default text attributes to apply to the subtitle when it’s rendered under the large title.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var largeSubtitleTextAttributes: [NSAttributedString.Key : Any] { get set }
```

## Configuring the subtitle

- **subtitleTextAttributes**: The default text attributes to apply to the subtitle rendered in the navigation bar.
